pull.title: Make bitcoin-deps (gitian/win32) deterministic, and only include files we actually use
pull.body:
Can someone confirm the determinism?

ab069992eaf3bde0e6580e00b19935c91438f57b657160b93643152511421cd2  gitian-inputs/bitcoin-deps-0.0.2.tbz2

events.message: Make bitcoin-deps (gitian/win32) deterministic, and only include files we actually use

events.body: What's the status of this? Doesn't-yet-make-the-build deterministic?
Correct; I guess some faketime trickery is needed also.
I'm working on this and should have a whole set of updates to our gitian scripts in the next couple of days.

Correct, this has been superceded. 

Pieter Wuille reply@reply.github.com wrote:

This was superceded by #887, right?
